Designing Sovereign AI Strategies

[TODO] Þróum fullveldislegar AI-áætlanir

[TODO] Icelandic translation pending. Replace this text with the approved Icelandic hero copy.

[TODO] Hafa samband við BTR

Strategy, pilots, and partners stay in lockstep.

We translate national priorities into living specifications, validate with evidence-driven pilots, and coordinate trusted partners so delivery teams—from ministries to frontier model vendors—are aligned from day one.

  • Blueprints that codify sovereign policy, data stewardship, and risk controls.
  • Pilot programmes designed to prove strategy and surface evidence before scale.
  • Partner governance that keeps strategic partners aligned to sovereign objectives.
